answerText: The Real Life of Sebastian Knight[10] Nabokov also wrote this work about a 999 line poem written by John Shade and edited by Charles Kinbote which tells of Charles II, the former king of Zembla.
heading: 2012 Penn-ance |2012 | 2 | 17 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The narrator of this work compares The Doubtful Asphodel to his own life after finding out about his brother's affair with Nina Lecerf. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel by Vladimir Nabokov in which V. tries to write a biography of his novelist brother, the title character.
